title: If We Have Our New Year’s Allowance!
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Honoka-chan, here, over here!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ah, Rin-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Did you bring your new year's allowance?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Of course! With the combination of our allowance and a sale, we can buy everything we want, right. I kind of want a skirt, and a pair of boots too....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin is kind of hungry nya. How about we eat lunch before we go to the sale?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I’m also hungry! Then, let’s go to a good panini place....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin wants Ramen nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Then.... Let’s go eat ramen for lunch, and panini for desert! We have our new year allowance, after all. We can afford to be luxurious~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Luxurious nya-! Rin will also order double noodles nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Then I’ll order it with seasoned eggs. Let’s go, let’s go-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
